resources.string: 1. Which are the modules of Web layer? Correct answer - A) WebSocket, Servlet, Web, Portlet
2. Which is the correct implementation class of BeanFactory? Correct answer - A) XmlBeanFactory
3.What is true about list collection configuration elements? Correct answer - A) This helps in wiring a list of values, allowing duplicates.

4. What is bean autowiring? Correct answer - A) Autowiring lets Spring resolve collaborators (other beans) for your bean by inspecting the contents of the BeanFactory without using constructor-arg and property elements.
5. What is RequestHandledEvent:event? Correct answer - C) This event is published when the HTTP session is initialized or refreshed.
6. How around advice works? Correct answer - A) Run advice before and after the advised method is invoked.
7. Which of the following database is not supported using jdbcTemplate? Correct answer - C) NoSql
8. Expression Language/ SpEL was introduced in which version of spring framework. Correct answer - C) 3.0
9. Which of the following class can be used to call Stored Procedures in spring? Correct answer - D) SimpleJdbcCall
10. What is the use of a content provider in Android? Correct answer - C) A content provider is used to share information between Android applications.
11. While developing android application developers can test their apps on Correct answer - D) Apps can be tested in all the sources mentioned above.
12. In android, mini activities are also known as Correct answer - C) In android, mini activities are also known as Fragments
13. Among the following choose the one which converts Java bytecode into Dalvik bytecode Correct answer - A) dex compiler converts convert JAVA bytecode into Dalvik bytecode.
14. The services in android can be stopped using which of the following method? Correct answer - B) stopSelf() and stopService() method can be used to stop services in android.
15. Activity in Android can be killed using? Correct answer - D) Activity in Android can be killed using both finishActivity (int requestCode) and finish() method.
